name: Eador. Imperium
descr:
Hire heroes, build an army, prevail in battles and try to keep your empire intact in the face of grave danger.

[b]Eador. Imperium[/b] is a new chapter in Eador series, known for its unique blend of grand strategy, turn-based tactics and RPG elements.[h2]Story[/h2]
A young wizard pursuing his revenge against the fanatics who have ruined his life. A barbarian priestess searching for a higher purpose for her people. A mercenary facing the abyss about to consume his home. A governor appointed to rule over a defiant province in times of great crisis.

Threads of their lives will weave a strange pattern, for the destiny of the Imperium is at stake.[h2]Features[/h2]
[list][li]All new and handcrafted story campaign, bringing a fresh approach to the Eador formula.
[/li][li]New heroes, new units and unique Shard worlds offer even more strategic possibilities and unexpected challenges.
[/li][li]The ultimate Eador game: Imperium includes all original content from Masters of the Broken World (not counting the campaign).[/li][/list]
